mapper.select:
SELECT "composite_key" AS "cmpyKey" , "import_date" AS "imptDate" , "news_date" AS "newsDate" , "year" AS "year" , "month" AS "mont" , "day" AS "day" , "quarter" AS "qutr" , "industry_code" AS "instCode" , "subsidiary_code" AS "susiCode" , "company_code" AS "cmpyCode" , "company_name" AS "cmpyName" , "company_name_only" AS "cmpyNameOnly" , "ta_score" AS "taScre" , "news_title" AS "newsTtl" , "raw_data" AS "rawData" , "ext_data" AS "extData" , "ext_morphs" AS "extMorp" FROM NLP."nlp_news"
limit 50
